string Package¶

anagram Module¶

Solve the HackerRank Anagram Challenge

practice.hackerrank.algorithms.string.anagram.make_anagram(s)[source]¶

Divide a string into 2 strings and indicate the number of changes that need to be made to the first string to make it an anagram of the second string.

Parameters:s – input string
Returns:
